response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and dedication. I believe its true worth exceeds $10,000, but I am willing to consider your offer. To make this proposition attractive, I propose a price of $15,000. Please let me know if this aligns with your interests or if you would like to discuss further details.", "product_price": 15000}
